welcome_to_brta: Welcome to the BRTA Service Portal
hero_content: BRTA Service Portal (BSP) is an online service provider of Bangladesh Road Transport Authority (BRTA) where drivers, car owners, car dealers are registered and serviced for learner driving license, smart card driving license, driving license renewal, duplicate driving license etc. Application and fee can be paid online.
review_each_data_before_edit_or_delete: Review each data before edit or delete
name: Name
are_you_sure_to_delete_this: Are you sure to delete this?
you_will_not_be_able_to_revert_this: You won't be able to revert this!
